SEARCH
Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
The Customer class represents a customer in the flight booking system. It includes details such as the customer's ID, name, phone number, email address, and a list of bookings made by the customer.
